column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////4) Bacon: It pretty much goes without saying that I have to get the bacon at any of Brendan Sodikoff's restaurants. The bacon is some of the best that I've had
column4: maple goodness that melts in your mouth. I found that bites of the bacon went very well with the steak
column5: but then again what doesn't bacon go well with? Just go ahead and do yourself a favor and get this.
